entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is warning Harry Potter not to go back to Hogwarts. He is described as having 'bat ears' and being emotional when talking about Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. Dobby is warning him not to go back to Hogwarts because he has met the Dark Lord twice.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who does not like the name 'Harry Potter'. Mentioned as a painful thought for Harry.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a powerful and evil entity that Harry has met twice. Dobby heard about this from someone else.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Harry Potter goes to learn magic. Dobby warns Harry not to go back there.

relationships.description: Dobby has come to protect Harry Potter and warn him about going back to Hogwarts.
Dobby warns Harry Potter not to go back to Hogwarts.
